subject: College Athletics
Basketball
Athletics and Sports
Cellular Telephones
Wireless Communications
lead_paragraph: Beginning in August 2007, the N.C.A.A. banned Division I colleges from using text messaging to recruit athletes.  But now, the issue is being revisited once again.
snippet: Beginning in August 2007, the N.C.A.A. banned Division I colleges from using text messaging to recruit athletes.  But now, the issue is being revisited once again.
